title: Musk seeks up to $134 billion in damages in lawsuit against OpenAI and Microsoft

title: After 15,000 layoffs, Microsoft cuts news and library access amid shift to AI learning
description: After 15,000 mass layoffs, Microsoft is cutting down its library and newspaper access for doubling its artificial intelligence learning.
content:
Microsoft has been upscaling its artificial intelligence capability for months now, amid this development the company conducted mass layoffs with 15,000 job cuts last year.
Now reports are, the company is also cutting down its library and newspaper a... [1920 chars]

title: Google introduces new AI model to convert textbooks into interactive lessons
description: Google has rolled out an experimental artificial intelligence model to reshape how textbooks are used. The tool focusses on personalised, interactive learning formats backed by early research findings. Learners can use the tool to convert textbooks into mind maps, quizzes etc. and stud in the way they like.
content: Google has introduced a new experimental artificial intelligence model that aims to change how students engage with textbooks. The tool, named 'Learn Your Way', converts standard academic materials into interactive lessons that are visual, flexible a... [2674 chars]

title: ‘I sent xAI a cease-and-desist letter’: California’s Attorney General takes action against Grok amid major backlash
description: California Attorney General Robert Bonta on Friday sent a cease-and-desist letter to xAI demanding the company stop the creation and distribution of artificial intelligence-generated nonconsensual sexualized imagery by its Grok chatbot.
content:
The Attorney General of California Robert Bonta on Friday announced that it is investigating xAI over Grok using its chatbot to create the sexually explicit images of women and young girls.

title: ‘I use ChatGPT like a lifecoach ... It has helped me avoid a lot of arguments’
description: Hundreds of millions of users are turning to artificial intelligence for advice, help and emotional support
content:
When Claudia Zedda decided she wanted to run a half marathon, she turned to artificial intelligence.
She asked the AI bot ChatGPT to create a plan for her 21km run.
